VST 3 SDK  VST 3.7
SDK for developing VST plug-in
 

- i -

  • ID() : ClassInfo
  • info() : PluginFactory
  • init() : ParamChanges , ParameterContainer
  • initialize() : Component , ComponentBase , EditController , SingleComponentEffect
  • instance() : MidiIO , PluginContextFactory , TestDefaults
  • isActive() : Bus , BypassProcessor< T >
  • isAttached() : CPluginView
  • isEnabled() : MidiIO
  • isMidiNetworkEnabled() : MidiIO
  • isPlatformTypeSupported() : CPluginView , VSTGUIEditor
  • isPlugInterfaceSupported() : PlugInterfaceSupport
  • isValidBus() : HostProcessData
